Role_Desc: Person/Pool-ID in the development department at Daimler Truck. Info: it does not automatically mean that this person works in the development team for the related ECU project, but this could be possible. On applying for the functional role, the user should automatically receive After-Sales ENHANCED for all the Cebid ECU's, After-Sales STANDARD Certificates as Standard Permissions.

Person/Pool-ID who is responsible for DiagnosticLink Tool development. On applying for the functional role, the user should automatically receive After-Sales ENHANCED for all the Cebid ECU's, After-Sales STANDARD, After-Sales BASIC, EPTI Certificates as Standard Permissions.
Reason_for_internal_FR: Functional role request for Vehicle validation

Role_Desc: Person/Pool-ID from an external service provider, who supports the Daimler Truck vehicle testing department. This service provided is conducted by Daimler Truck. On applying for the functional role, the user should automatically receive After-Sales ENHANCED for all the Cebid ECU's, After-Sales STANDARD Certificates as Standard Permissions.
Reason_for_External_FR: Functional role request for Vehicle Validation External Support
